body_html: Thanks for the PR! Unfortunately we still have a lot of internal and external apps that are shipping for iOS 10, and want to support old devices. I'd love to see if there was a clean way to make these architectures optional though, since you're right that for many developers building them is a waste of time.
body_text: Thanks for the PR! Unfortunately we still have a lot of internal and external apps that are shipping for iOS 10, and want to support old devices. I'd love to see if there was a clean way to make these architectures optional though, since you're right that for many developers building them is a waste of time.
body: Thanks for the PR! Unfortunately we still have a lot of internal and external apps that are shipping for iOS 10, and want to support old devices. I'd love to see if there was a clean way to make these architectures optional though, since you're right that for many developers building them is a waste of time.
